Class SecureByteArray

Namespace
OpenForge.Cryptography.LibOqs.Core
Assembly
OpenForge.Cryptography.LibOqs.Core.dll

A byte array wrapper that provides automatic secure clearing when disposed.

public sealed class SecureByteArray : IDisposable

Properties

Data

Gets the underlying byte array. Returns null if disposed.

public byte[]? Data { get; }

Property Value

byte[]

this[int]

Gets or sets a byte at the specified index.

public byte this[int index] { get; set; }

Parameters

index int

The zero-based index.

Property Value

byte

The byte at the specified index.

Exceptions

ObjectDisposedException

Thrown if the array has been disposed.

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if the index is out of range.

Length

Gets the length of the array. Returns 0 if disposed.

public int Length { get; }

Property Value

int

Methods

AsSpan()

Gets a span representing the data.

public Span<byte> AsSpan()

Returns

Span<byte>

A span of the underlying data, or empty if disposed.

CopyFrom(byte[], int, int, int)

Copies data from a source array into this secure array.

public void CopyFrom(byte[] source, int sourceIndex, int destinationIndex, int length)

Parameters

source byte[]

The source array to copy from.

sourceIndex int

The starting index in the source array.

destinationIndex int

The starting index in this array.

length int

The number of bytes to copy.

Dispose()

Securely clears the array and disposes of resources.

public void Dispose()

ToArray()

Creates a copy of the data as a regular byte array. Note: The returned array will not be securely cleared.

public byte[]? ToArray()

Returns

byte[]

A copy of the data, or null if disposed.
